Class Round

  • java.lang.Object
    • Round

  • public class Round
extends java.lang.Object
    Round class contains the core game logic. A new Round object is created and called in the Euchre class for each round. Stores information about the current round being played, including the trump suit, which team called trump, and number of tricks won by each team.

    • Method Detail

      • playRound

        public int playRound()
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        hub function that is called by the Euchre class to play a round
        Returns:
        the number of points that were scored this round (number will be negative if blue wins)
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • determineRoundWinner

        private int determineRoundWinner()
                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        runs at the end of a round, determines the winner based off number of tricks won
        Returns:
        the number of points that were scored this round (number will be negative if blue wins)
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • playTrick

        private int playTrick(int starter)
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        hub functino for each individual trick, runs 5 times per round
        Parameters:
        starter - the order of the player who is leading off this trick
        Returns:
        the order of the player who won the trick
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • determineTrickWinner

        private int determineTrickWinner(int starter)
                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        runs at the end of each trick, determines who won the trick
        Parameters:
        starter - the order of the player who lead the trick
        Returns:
        theh order of the player who won the trick
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • printWinner

        private void printWinner(int winner)
        prints the winner
        Parameters:
        winner - order of the player who won the trick

      • secondRoundTrump

        private boolean secondRoundTrump()
                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        hub function for the second round of trump calls
        Returns:
        true (trump must be called on the second round)
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

        Returns:

      • humanStickTheDealer

        private char humanStickTheDealer(Player p)

      • computerTrumpSecondRound

        private char computerTrumpSecondRound(Player p)
        calls the AI method in player for deciding whether to call trump on the second round
        Parameters:
        p - the player who has to decide whether to call trump
        Returns:
        the suit that has been called trump, or null character if player passes

      • playerTrumpSecondRound

        private char playerTrumpSecondRound(Player p)
        gives human player the opportunity to call trump or pass on second round
        Parameters:
        p - the player deciding whether to call trump
        Returns:
        the suit that has been called trump, or null character if player passes

      • printTrump

        prints out trump suit
        Parameters:
        trump - the trump suit

      • firstRoundTrump

        private boolean firstRoundTrump()
                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        hub function for the first round of trump calls
        Returns:
        true if trump was called, false if not
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • playerTrumpFirstRound

        private boolean playerTrumpFirstRound(Player p)
        allows human player to decided whether to call trump on first round
        Parameters:
        p - the player deciding whether to call trump
        Returns:
        true if trump was called, else false

      • cpuTrumpFirstRound

        private boolean cpuTrumpFirstRound(Player p)

        Returns:
